channel.title: Teleoperate Reachy with VR application on
channel.description: Recent content in Teleoperate Reachy with VR application on

item.title: Teleoperate Reachy with VR
item.description: Make sure all services are running on your robot before launching the VR teleoperation application. The teleoperation application is only compatible with Reachy 2021. If you purchased the VR teleoperation application, please refer to the corresponding user manual for more information.
